name: NovaMundi: The Spear of Chaquén
description:
NovaMundi: The Spear of Chaquén is a Historical Strategy Sim set in a beautiful and perilous land of mountains and jungles inspired by the geography of South America and its indigenous cultures. Your goal is to unite the Muisca people to repel the Spanish invasion of the Andean highlands.

As you explore the land, you will meet with the ever-increasing threat of the hostile Panche and Muzo tribes and the Spanish invasion force. Lead your party and avoid losing your way in the jungle, recruiting new members while your veteran units become stronger. Discover the location of the Muisca towns, and convince their people to join the fight.

New adventures await you every time, as the game world is generated procedurally with unique variations and challenges.
